content: Find past Voter Information Pamphlets and ballots | San Francisco Skip to main content English Español 中文 Filipino Menu Services Departments Search Find past Voter Information Pamphlets and ballots See past Voter Information Pamphlets as far back as 1907 and ballot images dating back to 2000. The Voter Information Pamphlet helps San Francisco voters make decisions. It contains information about local candidates, ballot measures, and more. To view Voter Information Pamphlets from as far back as 1907 and ballot images from 2000 to the present, visit the San Francisco Public Library's online archive . Get help Department of Elections 1 Dr. Carlton B. Goodlett Place City Hall, Room 48 San Francisco, CA 94102 Phone 415-554-4375 Fax: 415-554-7344 TTY: 415-554-4386 中文: 415-554-4367 Español: 415-554-4366 Filipino: 415-554-4310 Email sfvote@sfgov.org Last updated July 20, 2023 Department Department of Elections You must have JavaScript enabled to use this form.
